item.title: Whip animation
item.dc:creator: @Evil_One Evil One
item.description:
@Evil_One wrote:

Ok when you do the fly command and your weilding a whip, its just stationary…

I tried the code myself, and didnt work out to well…Here is teh general code for the fly in the first place:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fly") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; sendMessage("You raise up in the air..."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Can you make the whip jiggle through the air like when you walk?? Anyone…plz, k,thx bai

ALSO: (almost forgot)

If you can make me land on the ground, so i can walk again…that would be super…here is the command i tried and didnt work

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("flyoff") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSEA = 1501; sendMessage("...you settle to the ground"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Plz help…ill give you cookies if you do

Read full topic
